00093 #ifndef PARSER_HPP
00094 #define PARSER_HPP
00095 
00096 class DTDHandler;
00097 class EntityResolver;
00098 class DocumentHandler;
00099 class ErrorHandler;
00100 class InputSource;
00101 
00124 
00125 #include <xercesc/util/XercesDefs.hpp>
00126 
00127 class  Parser
00128 {
00129 public:
00131     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00132     //  Constructors and Destructor
00133     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00135     /** The default constructor */
00136     Parser()
00137     {
00138     }
00140     virtual ~Parser()
00141     {
00142     }
00144 
00145     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00146     // The parser interface
00147     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 
00166     virtual void setEntityResolver(EntityResolver* const resolver) = 0;
00167 
00183     virtual void setDTDHandler(DTDHandler* const handler) = 0;
00184 
00201     virtual void setDocumentHandler(DocumentHandler* const handler) = 0;
00202 
00220     virtual void setErrorHandler(ErrorHandler* const handler) = 0;
00221 
00250     virtual void parse
00251     (
00252         const   InputSource&    source
00253         , const bool            reuseGrammar = false
00254     ) = 0;
00255 
00278     virtual void parse
00279     (
00280         const   XMLCh* const    systemId
00281         , const bool            reuseGrammar = false
00282     ) = 0;
00283 
00306     virtual void parse
00307     (
00308         const   char* const     systemId
00309         , const bool            reuseGrammar = false
00310     ) = 0;
00312 
00313 
00314 private :
00315     /* The copy constructor, you cannot call this directly */
00316     Parser(const Parser&);
00317 
00318     /* The assignment operator, you cannot call this directly */
00319     void operator=(const Parser&);
00320 };
